User - Class in common.connectivity
The User class implements the Serializable interface to make it possible to save the object's state.
User() - Constructor for class common.connectivity.User
The default constructor for the User class.
User(String, String, String, String, String, String, String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class common.connectivity.User
A constructor for the User class that takes in the user's username, password, first name, last name, id, phone number, email address, logged in status, department, and status as arguments.
UserConnection - Class in common
The UserConnection class represents a connection made by a user to the server.
UserConnection(String, String, String) - Constructor for class common.UserConnection
Constructor for the UserConnection class that takes in the client IP, host name, and connection status as arguments.
